name: Frank E. HIRSCH, Respondent, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, BUREAU OF DRIVER LICENSING, Petitioner
name_abbreviation: Hirsch v. Commonwealth, Department of Transportation, Bureau of Driver Licensing

parties: Frank E. HIRSCH, Respondent, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, BUREAU OF DRIVER LICENSING, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 30th day of December, 1996, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED. The order of the Commonwealth Court is REVERSED and the matter is REMANDED to that Court for further proceedings consistent with this Court’s opinion in Commonwealth, Dept. of Transportation, Bureau of Driver Licensing v. Scott, — Pa. — , 684 A.2d 539 (1996).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
Frank E. HIRSCH, Respondent, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, BUREAU OF DRIVER LICENSING, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Dec. 30, 1996.
